short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify YouTube thumbnails to include Monica

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Modify YouTube thumbnails to include Monica Ray
Enhance your browsing experience with Monica. Is your browser experience boring? Are you having trouble finding engaging click-baity videos? Fear no more. This extension adds the loveable Monica to every thumbnail.

Compatible with all browsers
